# Support

## Getting Help

If you need help with Idento, here are your options:

### üìö Documentation

Start with our comprehensive documentation:

1. **[README.md](README.md)** - Project overview and quick start
2. **[README.ru.md](README.ru.md)** - Russian version
3. **[DEVELOPMENT.md](DEVELOPMENT.md)** - Detailed development guide for all platforms
4. **[docs/](docs/)** - Additional guides and documentation
5. **[.github/CI.md](.github/CI.md)** - CI/CD pipeline information

### üêõ Issues

Found a bug or have a feature request?

- **Bug Reports**: Use the [Bug Report template](https://github.com/thevladbog/idento/issues/new/choose)
- **Feature Requests**: Use the [Feature Request template](https://github.com/thevladbog/idento/issues/new/choose)
- **Documentation Issues**: Use the [Documentation template](https://github.com/thevladbog/idento/issues/new/choose)
- **Questions**: Use the [Question template](https://github.com/thevladbog/idento/issues/new/choose)

### üí¨ Discussions

For general questions, ideas, or discussions:
- Check [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/thevladbog/idento/discussions)
- Search existing discussions before creating a new one

### üîç Before Asking

Please check:
1. [Existing issues](https://github.com/thevladbog/idento/issues) - Someone might have already reported it
2. [Closed issues](https://github.com/thevladbog/idento/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed) - The issue might be resolved
3. Documentation - Most common questions are answered there

## What to Include in Support Requests

To help us help you faster, please include:

### For Bugs
- Operating system and version
- Go, Node, Docker versions
- Complete error messages and logs
- Steps to reproduce
- What you expected vs what happened

### For Questions
- What you're trying to achieve
- What you've already tried
- Relevant code snippets or configuration
- Error messages (if any)

## Response Times

- **Critical bugs** (security, data loss): Within 24-48 hours
- **Other issues**: Within 3-7 days
- **Feature requests**: Reviewed weekly
- **Questions**: Within 7 days

*Note: These are target times, not guarantees. Response times may vary.*
